claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

extracted_evidence.quote: Cell and egg based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations AVOIDS MUTATIONS4 Cell- and egg based flu vaccines hav
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote highlights that cell- and egg-based flu vaccines can develop mutations, implying that Flublok, by avoiding these mutations, maintains an identical antigenic match with the selected flu strains, supporting the claim.
